channel.title: Rohan Mehta
channel.description: Rohan Mehta's personal website, including writings, readings, and projects

item.title: Logarithms Are Clocks
item.description: Tired of remembering your logarithm rules? I've got just the solution – a mathematical timepiece!

item.title: The Ickabog (J.K. Rowling)
item.description: This book just proves what those of us who've read Harry Potter already know: any book J.K. Rowling writes is one you've got to read!

item.title: The Attention Mechanism Demystified
item.description: You can barely read a single deep learning paper nowadays without encountering the modern attention mechanism. But why does it work – and work so well?

item.title: Automatic Differentiation in Neural Nets
item.description: Automatic differentiation is the numerical computing technique that gave us the backpropagation algorithm. Let's find out how it works!

item.title: Sentiment Analysis of Marvel TV Shows
item.description: Yes, Ms. Marvel was review-bombed. Don't believe me? I'll prove it.

item.title: Data Science Meets Wordle
item.description: What can analyzing Twitter posts tell us about the viral word-game Wordle? Where do people play the most, and the best?

item.title: Childhood Poems
item.description: I took a stroll down memory lane a few days ago, and decided these poems were actually better than I remembered them to be. Maybe even worth you taking a look at!
